roleset.name: waltz
roleset.note: WALTZ-V NOTES: hand-checked by Kevin. Member of Vncls waltz-51.5. (from waltz.01-v)

role.descr: explicit mention of dance itself (rare), or path

example.name: Regular usage
example.text: They waltzed into the programme, charmed people, took photos with the security chief and the president, and then spilled the beans on Facebook.

example.name: with argA
example.text: He waltzed her across the floor
